charinfo.name: Darui (S)
charinfo.description: Darui (S) is a jounin of the Hidden Cloud Village and the right hand of the Yondaime Raikage. Despite his appearance Darui (S) is a formidable shinobi.

abilities.name: Laser Circus
abilities.description: Darui (S) uses Laser Circus on one enemy stunning their mental and ranged skills for 1 turn. All other enemies will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Electric Water Encampment Wall
abilities.description: Darui (S) uses Electric Water Encampment Wall on all enemies dealing 5 affliction damage*. The following turn Laser Circus and Black Panther Lightning will deal an additional 5 damage to an enemy affected by this skill.

abilities.name: Black Panther Lightning
abilities.description: Using Black Panther Lightning Darui (S) targets one enemy dealing 45 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Cleaver Sword Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Darui (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
